title: Home
content:
# About Me

![profile picture of Jedrzej Lewandowski](uploads/profile_bleeve_front_opt.jpg "Profile Picture of Jedrzej Lewandowski")

In 2010, I left my hometown Gdynia, the seacoast of Poland, to find a new challenge. Currently, I am living in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. I used to work in the fashion industry, but a few years ago I decided to change direction and become a developer.

Currently, I am working full time as a front-end developer at Zoover, a dutch traveling platform providing information about holiday destinations and offering packages from major tour operators.

In my free time, I love to listen to tech and science podcasts, lose myself in an audiobook (mostly science fiction) or take pictures with one of my cameras.
about:
# About Me

![profile picture of Jedrzej Lewandowski](uploads/profile_bleeve_front_opt.jpg "Profile Picture of Jedrzej Lewandowski")

In 2010, I left my hometown Gdynia, the seacoast of Poland, to find a new challenge. Currently, I am living in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. I used to work in the fashion industry, but a few years ago I decided to change direction and become a developer.

Currently, I am working full time as a front-end developer at Zoover, a dutch traveling platform providing information about holiday destinations and offering packages from major tour operators.

In my free time, I love to listen to tech and science podcasts, lose myself in an audiobook (mostly science fiction) or take pictures with one of my cameras.
techStack: # My Tech Stack * FaReact React * FaAngular Angular * FaCss3 CSS and Sass * FaJs JavaScript and TypeScript * FaCode RxJS, NextJS, GatsbyJS * FaNodeJs Node.js, Express, GraphQL * FaUserGraduate learning C++
